void OpenSim.Region.Framework.Interfaces.IGodsModule.KickUser ( UUID  godID,
UUID  sessionID,
UUID  agentID,
uint  kickflags,
string  reason 
)

Kicks User specified from the simulator. This logs them off of the grid.

Parameters:
godID The person doing the kicking
sessionID The session of the person doing the kicking
agentID the person that is being kicked
kickflags What to do to the user (kick, freeze/unfreeze)
reason The message to send to the user
